steps.processorData:
select
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    a/name/value as Form_Name,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value as Pat_Comms_Pw,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value/value as Able_To_Communicate_With_Relatives_By_themselves,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0007]/value/value as Last_Comms_Between_HCP_and_family,
    b_a/data[at0001]/items[at0008]/value/value as Comments
from EHR e contains 
top 1
COMPOSITION a[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1]
contains ADMIN_ENTRY b_a[openEHR-EHR-ADMIN_ENTRY.patient_communications_summary.v0]
where a/name/value='Patient Communications Summary'
order by created desc
